DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 2 , multicenter , randomize , open-label , sponsor-blind , active-controlled , dose-ranging trial female subject acute moderate severe episode vulvovaginal candidiasis . Subjects randomize 1 3 treatment arm ; CD101 gel , CD101 ointment , oral fluconazole . After randomization , subject see Day 7 ( +/-2 day ) , Day 14 ( +/- 2 day ) , & Day 28 ( +/-7 day ) assess therapeutic cure safety .
